Posts.EditableText:
I'm in the process of creating a new TA game, and currently copying all my settings from an old game into the new one. I've done all the interface stuff, but to get it looking and functioning like the old one, I need to add all the templates and libraries, that are usually accessed from the 'advanced' tree at the bottom of the left pane... but it's not there in this latest version of Quest (online)??

If it helps, I need the following:

[b:33u3hqn7]Included libraries[/b:33u3hqn7]
English.aslx
Core.aslx
dimsome.aslx
ConvLib.aslx
retrostyle.aslx

[b:33u3hqn7]Templates[/b:33u3hqn7]
Dynamic Templates
Object Types
Javascript

Thanks in advance.
Posts.HTML:
I'm in the process of creating a new TA game, and currently copying all my settings from an old game into the new one. I've done all the interface stuff, but to get it looking and functioning like the old one, I need to add all the templates and libraries, that are usually accessed from the 'advanced' tree at the bottom of the left pane... but it's not there in this latest version of Quest (online)??

If it helps, I need the following:
